Returns: a database cursor containing a list of start and end days for events
Parameters: int: the first Julian day in the range
int: the number of days to load (must be at least 1)
String: the columns to return in the cursor
query(android.content.ContentResolver,in.Description: Retrieves the days with events for the Julian days starting at "startDay" for "numDays". It returns a cursor containing startday and endday representing the max range of days for all events beginning on each startday.This is a blocking function and should not be done on the UI thread.
query(android.content.ContentResolver,in.FullName: public static Cursor query (ContentResolver cr, int startDay, int numDays, String[] projection)

ClassDesc: Fields and helpers for querying for a list of days that contain events.
